title: Origins Blood in the Sand
description: Six friends born during a rare astrological alignment in ancient Sumeria are destined for greatness. They will become the first vampires on Earth. Their leader, a headstrong woman named Ari, becomes the subject of adoration by their ruler, King Ashurhassan. He desires for Ari and her friends to build an army of undead to rule with him. A chance encounter reveals a prophecy with deadly intentions. As Ari struggles with the darkness residing within her, she must find the strength to save not only her family but all of Sumeria from the deadly clutches of their King.
author: Candace L. Bowser
